title: Can we talk about this korean lucian build...?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJ2E9Io8gEs

I tried it not expecting much....

it is glorious. I will never build reaver again.

basically yomuu's into BC rush. with BC being cheaper, it is super  easy, and armor pen on lucian makes him hit like a truck.

after that you can build whatever. you'll probably already by 7/0 by that point....

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCARZJejxRnmQ0m_tU7MgRiA

^ youtube channel it is on

damn video broke again :(
